about_the_game:
Discord: rkdp2fr3qv

Follow YouTube account: ZYI Game

Description of the contents of the Demo version:

In the Demo version, you can experience the core gameplay of the game. The duration of a single game is about 30 minutes. Of course, you can also continue playing in endless mode.

Note that some art resources in the current Demo version are not the final version, and many skills and special mechanisms have not yet been added. Please wait patiently for our updates!

Thank you for your attention!

The following is an introduction to the full version of the game:

The mysterious force found you to sign a contract because of your potential, hoping that you will perform the Zerg hunting mission and provide the power of the contract to help you become stronger. You can increase basic attributes through the power of the contract, or you can purchase props, skills, ammunition, etc. through the contract points to improve your combat effectiveness.

Game Demo Features

  • Free Matching: Create your own school through the combination of weapons, props, and abilities, and enjoy a different and refreshing experience every time you play!

  • Equipment Synthesis: Core items can be synthesized and advanced, unlocking dozens of synthesis formulas, bringing huge improvements.

  • Special Mastery: High-level mastery of special attributes, activate unique effects, let the combat power soar, and reverse the situation!

  • Basic Strengthening: Upgrade basic attributes to high-level, unlock hidden attribute changes, and shape your ultimate character.

  • Relaxed and casual: A game only takes 20 to 30 minutes, and you can release pressure anytime, anywhere.

  • One-handed Play: The character attacks automatically, and you can easily enjoy the pleasure of mowing with one hand!

  • Challenge the Zerg Tide: Facing the besieged Zerg army, can you break through the siege and find a way to survive?

  • Multiplayer: Support 2 people online or LAN connection, fight side by side with teammates, and don't give up any companions!

  • Diverse roles: From the fantasy sword box that controls the flying sword to the alchemy chariot bombarded by artillery fire, choose your style and gallop on the battlefield!

More unique game content will be launched in future updates, so stay tuned!

name: Contract of Zerg Hunter Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: In this survival game, players become contractors bound by mysterious forces, tasked with hunting dangerous Zerg. Battle to upgrade attributes, unlock contract powers, and buy weapons to craft your fighting style. Face relentless insect swarms and bosses in solo or 2-player co-op. Can you prevail?
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
